availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Cassius C. Claxon (Owen County, Kentucky, tenant.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, tenant. Kentucky native. Married Mary Bennet Claxon in Owen County, Kentucky on May 31, 1856. Father of William Claxon. Tenant in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 221.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Gratz, p. 143B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film #000272775, p. 23.
